about.title: About Me
about.text: I am Elderson Luciano Mezzomo, a dedicated and creative frontend developer with a passion for JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3. I have a unique combination of experience in team leadership, analytical thinking, and deep knowledge in frontend development. With a passion for exact sciences, I have acquired solid skills in frontend development and am now eager to further develop my technical skills in a dynamic and innovative environment.

project1.desc: The website for the "Nuray Bal" hair salon in Marburg was developed to showcase the salon's services and ambiance in an attractive and user-friendly manner.
project1.html: HTML: Use of semantic HTML5 for a clear, accessible structure and the implementation of a video embed on the homepage.
project1.css: CSS: Flexible techniques with CSS variables for a consistent color and design palette, which adapts responsively to different screen sizes. Transition effects for a smooth user experience.
project1.js: JavaScript: Dynamic language switching and customizable header elements that enhance the user experience.
project1.conclusion: Conclusion: This project demonstrates my ability to create professional and user-friendly websites using modern web technologies.

project2.desc: Schlafklang is an interactive web application that helps users create a relaxing sleep environment by allowing them to select a countdown timer, a background video, and music according to their preferences.
project2.html: HTML: Clear structuring of selection options (timer, background, and music) for intuitive operation.
project2.css: CSS: Minimalist design with dark colors and subtle animations to support a relaxing atmosphere. Flexibility through CSS variables.
project2.js: JavaScript: Volume control and full-screen mode based on the remaining time, providing a seamless user experience.
project2.conclusion: Conclusion: Schlafklang showcases my skills in developing interactive and user-centered web applications that are both functional and aesthetically pleasing.

project3.desc: Central CAIXA brings together all apps, social networks, and support channels of CAIXA ECONÃ”MICA FEDERAL in one place. The app aims to reduce digital barriers, especially for users with low digital literacy.
project3.html: HTML: Well-structured sections that allow for intuitive navigation between apps, websites, and social networks.
project3.css: CSS: Visual differentiation between installed and uninstalled apps to guide users, supported by CSS animations and transitions.
project3.js: JavaScript: Detection of installed apps on the user's device and seamless integration with the corresponding app stores for downloads.
project3.conclusion: Social Responsibility: This project promotes digital inclusion and facilitates access to important services for all users.
project3.conclusionFinal: Conclusion: Central CAIXA demonstrates my ability to develop user-friendly and inclusive applications that provide social value.
